title.rendered: UNIQA offer now is wider than ever

content.rendered:
UNIQA: new indexes and coatings, for the solar proposal as well
Thanks to the great success of the product, we have expanded the offer of UNIQA progressive lenses, introducing new indexes and coatings, also applicable to the solar proposal.

excerpt.rendered: UNIQA: new indexes and coatings, for the solar proposal as well Thanks to the great success of the product, we have expanded the offer of UNIQA progressive lenses, introducing new indexes and coatings, also applicable to the solar proposal.
